short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Chrome new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal new tab extension for your browser.

Features:
- Date & Time
- Daily random wallpapers via Unsplash
- Location-based weather forecast
- Advanced customization options
- Minimal UI

What is new?
- Countdown / Pomodoro
- Bookmark
- New widget visibility options
